intro: Poterium tenuifolium, commonly known as slender-leafed poterium, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, elongated leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in shaded, moist environments such as undergrowth in forests. Poterium tenuifolium is sometimes cultivated for its ornamental value due to its delicate foliage and floral display.
